item.description:
Hey all,

This is the last meetup I'll organize through here and will send emails out to the group, so send your email if you haven't already. Or, if someone else wants to pay the monthly fee for this, feel free to take it over :)

Diamondbacks are next week, which means late game nights, so figured I'd make the next one for Thursday against the Marlins and we can discuss the next meetup from there... possibly get them going more regularly.

Have a great weekend!

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Cubs v. Marlins
